test.name: To check that seller is able to Register to the Ofofo platform

kw.name: Create Webdriver
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening url 'https://seller-dev.ofofo.io/registration'

kw.name: Register by entering all the values
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text '123' into text field 'id:firstName'.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
kw.msg: Element 'xpath:(//p[contains(@class,'error_message mb-0')])[1]' is displayed.
